dct_title_s: Sketch of roads from Piquetberg and Ceres Road station to Calvinia, 1889
dct_description_sm: "The distance of the two lines is practically the same being 169_ & 170 miles. Checked in Surveyor Generals Office - new line if made will be about the same."
dct_spatial_sm: Good Hope, Cape of (South Africa : Cape)
